values.description: Allow FastAPI app to access Vault
values.name: fastapi-app-vault-sg

after.description: Allow FastAPI app to access Vault
after.name: fastapi-app-vault-sg

description.constant_value: Allow FastAPI app to access Vault

app_image.description: Docker image for the FastAPI app (ECR or DockerHub).

aws_region.description: AWS region to deploy resources in.

domain_name.description: Domain name for the application (used for ACM and Route53).

private_subnet_cidrs.description: List of private subnet CIDR blocks.

public_subnet_cidrs.description: List of public subnet CIDR blocks.

vault_addr.description: Vault address for the FastAPI app to connect to.

vault_ami_id.description: AMI ID for HashiCorp Vault EC2 instance.

vault_instance_type.description: EC2 instance type for HashiCorp Vault.
